game.description: Rescue the princess captured by the cruel dragon.
game.objective: Save Princess Lativia from Dragon's peak and bring her safely back to the castle.
game.reward: Gold, magical artifacts, and Kingdom's highest honor - Knight of the Round Table.

tasks.description: Find a reliable source of information about the dragon's lair.
tasks.objective: Gather as much information as possibly about the Dragon's Peak.

tasks.description: Seek assistance from the mighty sorcerer in the enchanted forest.
tasks.objective: Acquire magical protection against dragon fire from the sorcerer.

tasks.description: Travel to Dragon's Peak and defeat the dragon.
tasks.objective: Defeat the dragon and rescue Princess Lativia.

tasks.description: Return to the castle with the princess.
tasks.objective: Report to King Arthur and return his daughter.

game.title: Dragon's Peak Rescuer
